channel.title: Projects on Chris LaBarge
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chris LaBarge

item.title: Typing Speed Calculator
item.description: This is a simple words per minute typing calculator. I built it using the Volt framework, which specializes in running your Ruby code on the CLIENT as well as the server. I did not write a single line of Javascript, as Volt uses the Opal gem to compile your Ruby code to javascript. You can read about how I made this simple app here .

item.title: Tech Valley Ruby Brigade
item.description: This is redesign I did for a local User-Group of Ruby programmers. It was already using github pages for hosting so there was no need to mess with the back-end, I simply updated the bootstrap and took advantage of the responsive grid.
